49 #include "normalize_dot.inl"
glm::normalizeDot
GLM_FUNC_DECL T normalizeDot(vecType< T, P > const &x, vecType< T, P > const &y)
Normalize parameters and returns the dot product of x and y.
glm::fastNormalizeDot

Normalize parameters and returns the dot product of x and y.
